meanings.definition: To make a list of items or names.
meanings.sent1: I listed all the groceries we need to buy.
meanings.sent2: She listed her favorite colors as blue and green.
meanings.sent3: The teacher listed the homework assignments on the board.
meanings.sent4: The chef listed the ingredients needed for the recipe.
meanings.sent5: He listed the reasons why he deserved a promotion.

meanings.sent1: He listed his friends' names in the party invitation.
meanings.sent2: The menu listed various options for appetizers.
meanings.sent3: She listed her preferences for the movie night snacks.
meanings.sent4: The brochure listed the attractions in the theme park.
meanings.sent5: They listed the available dates for the meeting.

meanings.definition: To be officially recorded or recognized.
meanings.sent1: Her name was listed in the school's honor roll.
meanings.sent2: The company was listed on the stock exchange.
meanings.sent3: His achievements were listed in the local newspaper.
meanings.sent4: The artist's work was listed in the art gallery catalog.
meanings.sent5: The event was listed in the community calendar.
